Posts.Content: Hi, I am looking for advice or anything really, my partner had a double masectomy , her left side also had lymph nodes removed. She has a seroma that wont stop, its been drained every 2 weeks or so for the last 18 months, the most its had a one point is 850mls, this is painful. The surgeon operated again and removed the pocket, but it has not helped we have no idea what to do next? has anyone hed this same problem?
Posts.Title: Seroma trouble
